lead_paragraph: Former President George W. Bush’s forthcoming memoir, “Decision Points,” will probably receive close scrutiny by people who have followed the legal and policy debates that arose over his administration’s approach to the war on terrorism.
snippet: Former President George W. Bush’s forthcoming memoir, “Decision Points,” will probably receive close scrutiny by people who have followed the legal and policy debates that arose over his administration’s approach to the war on terrorism.

headline.main: In Memoir, Bush Addresses 9/11 Policy Controversies
